data.label: Conversational Retrieval QA Chain
data.name: conversationalRetrievalQAChain
data.description: Document QA - built on RetrievalQAChain to provide a chat history component

inputParams.label: Rephrase Prompt
inputParams.name: rephrasePrompt
inputParams.description: Using previous chat history, rephrase question into a standalone question
inputParams.warning: Prompt must include input variables: {chat_history} and {question}

inputParams.label: Response Prompt
inputParams.name: responsePrompt
inputParams.description: Taking the rephrased question, search for answer from the provided context
inputParams.default:
I want you to act as a document that I am having a conversation with. Your name is "AI Assistant". Using the provided context, answer the user's question to the best of your ability using the resources provided.
If there is nothing in the context relevant to the question at hand, just say "Hmm, I'm not sure" and stop after that. Refuse to answer any question not about the info. Never break character.
------------
{context}
------------
REMEMBER: If there is no relevant information within the context, just say "Hmm, I'm not sure". Don't try to make up an answer. Never break character.

inputAnchors.label: Memory
inputAnchors.name: memory
inputAnchors.description: If left empty, a default BufferMemory will be used

inputAnchors.label: Input Moderation
inputAnchors.description: Detect text that could generate harmful output and prevent it from being sent to the language model
inputAnchors.name: inputModeration

inputs.responsePrompt:
I want you to act as a document that I am having a conversation with. Your name is "AI Assistant". Using the provided context, answer the user's question to the best of your ability using the resources provided.
If there is nothing in the context relevant to the question at hand, just say "Hmm, I'm not sure" and stop after that. Refuse to answer any question not about the info. Never break character.
------------
{context}
------------
REMEMBER: If there is no relevant information within the context, just say "Hmm, I'm not sure". Don't try to make up an answer. Never break character.

outputAnchors.name: conversationalRetrievalQAChain
outputAnchors.label: ConversationalRetrievalQAChain
outputAnchors.description: Document QA - built on RetrievalQAChain to provide a chat history component

data.label: ChatGoogleVertexAI
data.name: chatGoogleVertexAI
data.description: Wrapper around VertexAI large language models that use the Chat endpoint

inputParams.label: Connect Credential
inputParams.name: credential
inputParams.description: Google Vertex AI credential. If you are using a GCP service like Cloud Run, or if you have installed default credentials on your local machine, you do not need to set this credential.

inputParams.label: Custom Model Name
inputParams.name: customModelName
inputParams.description: Custom model name to use. If provided, it will override the model selected

inputParams.label: Allow Image Uploads
inputParams.name: allowImageUploads
inputParams.description: Allow image input. Refer to the docs for more details.

inputParams.label: Top Next Highest Probability Tokens
inputParams.name: topK
inputParams.description: Decode using top-k sampling: consider the set of top_k most probable tokens. Must be positive

outputAnchors.name: chatGoogleVertexAI
outputAnchors.label: ChatGoogleVertexAI
outputAnchors.description: Wrapper around VertexAI large language models that use the Chat endpoint
outputAnchors.type: ChatGoogleVertexAI | ChatVertexAI | ChatGoogle | ChatGoogleBase | BaseChatModel | BaseLanguageModel | Runnable

data.label: Chroma
data.name: chroma
data.description: Upsert embedded data and perform similarity search upon query using Chroma, an open-source embedding database

inputParams.label: Connect Credential
inputParams.name: credential
inputParams.description: Only needed if you have chroma on cloud services with X-Api-key

inputParams.label: Top K
inputParams.name: topK
inputParams.description: Number of top results to fetch. Default to 4

inputAnchors.label: Record Manager
inputAnchors.name: recordManager
inputAnchors.description: Keep track of the record to prevent duplication

inputAnchors.description: Detect text that could generate harmful output and prevent it from being sent to the language model
inputAnchors.name: inputModeration

inputs.systemMessage: You are a helpful AI assistant.

outputAnchors.name: toolAgent

data.label: Chat Prompt Template
data.name: chatPromptTemplate
data.description: Schema to represent a chat prompt

inputParams.label: System Message
inputParams.name: systemMessagePrompt
inputParams.placeholder: You are a helpful assistant that translates {input_language} to {output_language}.

inputParams.label: Human Message
inputParams.name: humanMessagePrompt
inputParams.description: This prompt will be added at the end of the messages as human message

inputParams.label: Messages History
inputParams.name: messageHistory
inputParams.description: Add messages after System Message. This is useful when you want to provide few shot examples

tabs.label: Add Messages (Code)
tabs.name: messageHistoryCode

inputs.systemMessagePrompt:
'''You are a helpful and professional AI coding assistant for programmers. 
                 Read this code_snippet {code_snippet} and choose one snipped that is most relevant to
                 {language} and {query} from user. Explain how it is working to the user in 4
                 sentences. Make sure to read the {meta_data} and explain the metadata as it relates to
                 the code snippet and provide the url. 
                 Follow this template and do not digress from this:
                 1. Code snippet in pretty print
                 2. Explanation
                 3. Metadata explanation
                 4. Additional explanation if {code_snippet} doesn't address the {query}
                 5. Provide documentation link for {language}
                 6. Provide documentation link for that might we helpful'''
inputs.humanMessagePrompt:
Please analyze the following code snippet and metadata to help me understand how it works. The code is written in {language}, and I need it to address {query}. Follow the template below:

Code snippet in pretty print

Explanation of how the code works (in 4 sentences)

Metadata explanation and how it relates to the code snippet

Additional explanation if the code snippet doesn't fully address the query

Documentation link for the programming language

Additional documentation link that might be helpful

Here is the code snippet and metadata:

Code snippet: {code_snippet}

Metadata: {meta_data}

outputAnchors.name: chatPromptTemplate
outputAnchors.label: ChatPromptTemplate
outputAnchors.description: Schema to represent a chat prompt

data.label: Chat Prompt Template
data.name: chatPromptTemplate
data.description: Schema to represent a chat prompt

inputParams.label: System Message
inputParams.name: systemMessagePrompt
inputParams.placeholder: You are a helpful assistant that translates {input_language} to {output_language}.

inputParams.label: Human Message
inputParams.name: humanMessagePrompt
inputParams.description: This prompt will be added at the end of the messages as human message

inputParams.label: Messages History
inputParams.name: messageHistory

tabs.label: Add Messages (Code)
tabs.name: messageHistoryCode

inputs.systemMessagePrompt:
You are a helpful and professional AI assistant that looks at {wikipedia_links} and 
            chooses the most related 4 wikipedia titles to the programming {language}. 
            You will present these three titles as python string like so: title1, title2, title3, title4.
            Do not provide anything else.
inputs.humanMessagePrompt: Please analyze the following Wikipedia links and select the 4 titles that are most relevant to the programming language Python. Present the selected titles as a Python string in the following format: title1, title2, title3, title4. Do not provide any additional explanations or information.

outputAnchors.name: chatPromptTemplate
outputAnchors.label: ChatPromptTemplate
outputAnchors.description: Schema to represent a chat prompt

inputs.systemMessagePrompt:
You are a helpful and professional AI assistant that looks at {wikipedia_links} and 
            chooses the most related 4 wikipedia titles to the programming {language} and {domain}. 
            You will present these three titles as python string like so: title1, title2, title3, title4.
            Do not provide anything else.
inputs.humanMessagePrompt: Please analyze the following Wikipedia links and select the 4 titles that are most relevant to the programming language Python and the domain Machine Learning. Present the selected titles as a Python string in the following format: title1, title2, title3, title4. Do not provide any additional explanations or information.
